Question: Cheney's wife, Lynne, presented Stewart with a this person action figure on her appearance on the show on October 10, 2007.
Hints: Palpatine sends this person to kill everyone inside the Jedi Temple, and then to assassinate the Separatist leaders on Mustafar.
In the novel Splinter of the Mind's Eye (1978), this person and Luke duel, and Luke cuts off this person's right arm.
This person kills the Jedi and kidnaps the man's young Force-sensitive son, whom he raises as his secret apprentice.
